contentrichtext.text: <!-- BEGIN WikiProject Chernobrov infobox (scroll down to edit main article text) {| border="1" bgcolor="#ffffff" cellpadding="5" align="right" width="305" style="margin-left:3px" !bgcolor=#e7dcc3 colspan=2|'''Vadim Aleksandrovich CHERNOBROV''' |- |bgcolor=#e7dcc3|Birth:||1965, [[Russia]] |- |bgcolor=#e7dcc3|Education:||[[Moscow]] Aviation Institut (MAI university) |- |bgcolor=#e7dcc3|Profession:||Aerospace engineering, [[rocket]] building |- |bgcolor=#e7dcc3|Position:||[[Kosmopoisk]] scientific unit leader |- |bgcolor=#e7dcc3|Occupation:||Independent scientist, ufologist, cryptophysisist, writer, painter, traveller |- |bgcolor=#e7dcc3|Most impressive projects:||Lovondatr device, [[Encyclopedia of mysterious places on Earth]] book, [[Kosmopoisk]] community creation. |- |bgcolor=#e7dcc3|Contacts:|| '''Email:''' chernobrov@narod.ru; '''Website:''' http://chernobrov.narod.ru |} END WikiProject Chernobrov infobox --> '''Vadim Alexandrovich Chernobrov''' ({{lang-ru|Вадим Александрович Чернобров}}, born 1965, [[Volgograd Oblast]]) is the founder and leader of [[Kosmopoisk]] organisation.<ref>[http://www.irkutsk.org/fed/meteoit.html www.irkutsk.org]</ref> He is [[ufology]] and mystery enthusiast,<ref>{{cite news|url=http://rt.com/Sci_Tech/2009-06-29/Mysterious_circles_shock_locals_in_Russia_s_South.html?fullstory|title=Mysterious circles shock locals in Russia’s South|date=29 June 2009|work=RT|accessdate=22 January 2010}}</ref><ref>{{cite news|url=http://english.pravda.ru/science/19/94/377/11754_yeti.html|title=Yeti from Russia's Vyatka|date=12 January 2004|work=Pravda|language=English|accessdate=22 January 2010}}</ref> as well as meteorite hunter.<ref>{{cite news|url=http://news.google.co.uk/newspapers?id=nbQaAAAAIBAJ&sjid=SUQEAAAAIBAJ&pg=1874,2177278|title=Russian scientists find meteorite site|last=Associated Press|date=22 Jun 2003|work=Milwaukee Journal Sentinel|accessdate=22 January 2010}}</ref> He has conducted experiments into changing time flow rate since 1987.<ref>{{cite news|url=http://english.pravda.ru/science/19/94/379/12190_experiment.html|title=Time Can be Turned Back|date=1 March 2004|work=Pravda|language=English|accessdate=22 January 2010}}</ref><ref>{{cite news|url=http://english.pravda.ru/science/tech/22-02-2008/104194-gates_future-0|title=Gates to the future become reality this spring|date=22 February 2008|work=Pravda|language=English|accessdate=23 January 2010}}</ref> ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *[http://chernobrov.narod.ru Vadim Chernobrov's site] (in Russian) *[http://ufo.metrocom.ru/book2/chern_tv.htm The Mysteries of Time by V.Chernobrov] (in Russian) *[http://english.pravda.ru/science/19/94/377/13203_death.html Article by Chernobrov in Pravda] {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Chernobrov, Vadim | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = 1965 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Chernobrov, Vadim}} [[Category:Paranormal investigators]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:1965 births]] {{Russia-bio-stub}}
